import React,{useState}from'react';import{Modal,Button,Card,CardHeader,CardBody,CardFooter,Row}from'react-bootstrap';import Alerts from'../Alert';import axios from'axios';import{linkGetSellarDetails}from'../api_links';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowSellerDetails=_ref=>{let{show,handleClose,sellerId}=_ref;const[alertMessage,setAlertMessage]=useState(null);const[alertVariant,setAlertVariant]=useState(undefined);const[getSellerDetails,setGetSellerDetails]=React.useState([]);React.useEffect(()=>{if(show){fetchGetSellerDetails();}},[show]);// fetch data using axios
const fetchGetSellerDetails=()=>{axios.get(linkGetSellarDetails.replace('id',"".concat(sellerId))).then(response=>{console.log(response.data);setGetSellerDetails(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error("somthing went wrong",error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{show:show,onHide:handleClose,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Header,{closeButton:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Title,{children:"Seller Details"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alerts,{alertMessage:alertMessage,alertVariant:alertVariant,setAlertMessage:setAlertMessage})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:getSellerDetails&&getSellerDetails.map((detail,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardHeader,{children:[detail.first_name," ",detail.last_name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{children:["Email: ",detail.email,"Phone Number: ",detail.phone_number]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardFooter,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-info",children:"I'm interest"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",onClick:handleClose,children:"Close"})]})]},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Footer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",onClick:handleClose,children:"Close"})})]});};export default ShowSellerDetails;
